Text: Sindhi folktales ( لوڪ ڪهاڻيون) play an important part in the culture of the Sindhi people of southern Pakistan.

Text: Sindhi folk tales:  Pakistan's Sindh province abounds in fairy-tales and folktales that form its folklore.
